entry.string: SUCCESS
entry.translation: TAGUMPAY

entry.string: FAILURE
entry.translation: HINDI TAGUMPAY

entry.string: CAUTION
entry.translation: PAALA-ALA

entry.string: System Settings Check
entry.translation: Pag-check ng Settings ng Sistema

entry.string: For Xaraya to function properly, the installer must write your database information to the file:
entry.translation: Para tumakbo ng maayos ang Xaraya, ang installer ay dapat makasulat ng inmpormasyon tungkol sa database sa file:

entry.string: If your settings are not correct, this script will not be able to do so. The installer needs write access for steps 3 and 4 only.
entry.translation: Kung ang setting ay tama, ang script na ito ay hindi rin pwede na gumawa. Kailangan ng installer ng write access para sa mga hakbang 3 at 4 lamang.

entry.string: PHP Version is greater than or equal to 4.1.2. Your PHP Version is:
entry.translation: Ang version ng PHP ay mas mataas o kapantay ng 4.1.2. Ang version ng PHP mo ay:

entry.string: PHP Version is less than 4.1.2. Your PHP Version is:
entry.translation: Ang version ng PHP ay mababa sa 4.1.2. Ang version ng PHP mo ay:

entry.string: Please upgrade PHP.
entry.translation: Paki-upgrade ng PHP.

entry.string: The installer can write to the configuration file.
entry.translation: Ang installer ay pwedeng sumulat sa configuration file.

entry.string: The installer cannot write to the configuration file. Please verify that your webserver has write access to the file:
entry.translation: Ang installer ay hinde pwedeng sumulat sa configuration file. Paki-verify na ang iyong webserver ay may write access sa file:

entry.string: The installer can write to the directory:
entry.translation: Ang installer ay pwedeng sumulat sa directory:

entry.string: The installer cannot write to this directory:
entry.translation: Ang installer ay hindi pwedeng sumulat sa directory:

entry.string: Please verify that your webserver has write access to the directory:
entry.translation: Paki-verify na ang iyong webserver ay may write access sa directory:

entry.string: Please verify that your webserver has write access to this directory:
entry.translation: Paki-verify na ang iyong webserver ay may write access sa directory:

entry.string: The installer cannot write to the directory:
entry.translation: Ang installer ay hindi pwedeng sumulat sa directory:

entry.string: Locales Settings Check
entry.translation: Pag-check ng Settings ng Locales

entry.string: For translation to function properly, the Xaraya must have write access to files in the locales directory
entry.translation: Para tumakbo ng maayos ang pagsasalin, ang Xaraya ay dapat me write access sa mga filesa na nasa locales directory

entry.string: The Xaraya can write to the directory #(1) and all it's files and subdirectories
entry.translation: Ang Xaraya ay pwedeng sumulat sa directory #(1) at sa lahat ng nasa loob na files at subdirectories

entry.string: The installer cannot write to the directory #(1) and all it's files and subdirectories
entry.translation: Ang Xaraya ay hindi pwedeng sumulat sa directory #(1) at sa lahat ng nasa loob na files at subdirectories

entry.string: Please verify that your webserver has write access to the files under the directory:
entry.translation: Paki-verify na ang iyong webserver ay may write access sa files na nasa loob ng directory:

entry.string: This write access is only needed if you intend on using translations module at your site actively.
entry.translation: Ang write access ay kailangan lamang kung gusto mong aktibong gamitin ang translations module sa iyong site

entry.string: Information on Loaded PHP Extensions
entry.translation: Impormasyon tungkol sa Loaded PHP Extensions

entry.string: These extensions may be required for some modules to work; however the Xaraya core is not dependant on these extensions for installation. Refer to PHP.net for further information on these extensions.
entry.translation: Ang mga extensions na ito ay maaring kailangan sa ilang mga modules para tumakbo; sa isang banda, ang Xaraya core ay hindi nakadepende sa mga extension na ito sa installation. Sumangguni sa PHP.net para sa karagdagang impormasyon tungkol sa mga extension.

entry.string: The XML Extension is loaded.
entry.translation: Ang XML Extension ay naka-load.

entry.string: The XML Extension is not loaded.
entry.translation: Ang XML Extension ay hindi naka-load.

entry.string: The MySQL Extension is loaded.
entry.translation: Ang MySQL Extension ay naka-load.

entry.string: The MySQL Extension is not loaded. Xaraya will need either the PGSQL or MySQL extension to be loaded to proceed.
entry.translation: Ang MySQL Extension ay hindi naka-load. Kailangan ng Xaraya ang alinman sa PGSQL o MySQL extension na naka-load bago magpatuloy.

entry.string: The PGSQL Extension is loaded.
entry.translation: Ang PGSQL Extension ay naka-load.

entry.string: The PGSQL Extension is not loaded. Xaraya will need either the PGSQL or MySQL extension to be loaded to proceed.
entry.translation: Ang PGSQL Extension ay hindi naka-load. Kailangan ng Xaraya ang alinman sa PGSQL o MySQL extension na naka-load bago magpatuloy.

entry.string: The XSLT Extension is loaded.
entry.translation: Ang XSLT Extension ay naka-load.

entry.string: The XSLT Extension is not loaded. This extension is only needed for the XSLT transform module at this time.
entry.translation: Ang XSLT Extension ay hindi naka-load. Ang extension na ito ay kailangan lamang para sa XSLT transform module sa sandali na ito.

entry.string: The LDAP Extension is loaded.
entry.translation: Ang LDAP Extension ay naka-load.

entry.string: The LDAP Extension is not loaded. This extension is only needed if you intend on using LDAP authentication with the Xaraya LDAP Modules.
entry.translation: Ang LDAP Extension ay hindi naka-load. Ang extension na ito ay kailangan lamang kung gagamit ka ng LDAP authentication sa pamamagitan ng Xaraya LDAP Modules.

entry.string: The GD Extension is loaded.
entry.translation: Ang GD Extension ay naka-load.

entry.string: The GD Extension is not loaded. This extension is only needed for the images module at this time for resizing of thumbnails.
entry.translation: Ang GD Extension ay hindi naka-load. Ang extension na ito ay kailangan lamang para sa mga images module sa sandaling ito para sa pagpapalit ng laki ng thumbnails.

entry.string: Check Again >
entry.translation: Siyasatin muli >
